import React from 'react'; import {AppRoutes} from '../../routes/AppRoutes'; import {Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import {useAppDispatch, useAppSelector} from '../../store/hooks'; import {useGetFavoritesQuery} from '../../features/sixCitiesApi'; import {getAuth} from '../../store/serverData/serverData'; function Header() : JSX.Element { const userInfo = useAppSelector((state) => state.USER_ACTIVITY.userInfo); const auth = useAppSelector((state) => state.SERVER_DATA.auth); const {data: favorites} = useGetFavoritesQuery(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); return auth === 'AUTH' ? (
  • {userInfo} {favorites !==undefined && favorites?.length > 0 && ({favorites?.length})}
  • {dispatch(getAuth('NO_AUTH')); navigate(AppRoutes.Main);}}> Sign out
) : (
  • Sign in
); } export default Header;
